description: Students explore special topics in computer science. Topics may vary from year-to-year. The workload in this course is commensurate with a 0.25-credit course. May be repeated if topics are different. Offered periodically. Prerequisite: permission of instructor.
name: Top: Information Tech Management
notes: Enrollment by permission of instructor only.
This is a second-half of semester course.
title: Topics in Computer Science
